casebody.data:
DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL
v.
THOMAS 2018-0553 Supreme Court of Ohio. August 2, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

DISCIPLINARY CASES

Sua sponte, Mark Alan Thomas, Attorney Registration No. 0037922, last known business address in St. Clairsville, Ohio, found in contempt for failure to file an affidavit of compliance on or before June 29, 2018.
